body.gatha1: Ahaṃ nāgova saṅgāme, cāpato patitaṃ saraṃ;
Na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ;
Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;
Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.
body.gatha1: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
body.gatha1: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
body.gatha1: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyo, natthi bāle sahāyatā;
body.gathalast: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
body.gatha1: Atthamhi jātamhi sukhā sahāyā, tuṭṭhī sukhā yā itarītarena;
body.gathalast: Puññaṃ sukhaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi, sabbassa dukkhassa sukhaṃ pahānaṃ.
body.gatha1: Sukhā matteyyatā loke, atho petteyyatā sukhā;
body.gathalast: Sukhā sāmaññatā loke, atho brahmaññatā sukhā.
body.gatha1: Sukhaṃ yāva jarā sīlaṃ, sukhā saddhā patiṭṭhitā;
body.gathalast: Sukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
